name: Xtreme Rally
overview:
Xtreme Rally (known in Japan as Off Beat Racer!) is a 3D off-road racing game developed and released by SNK for arcades (running Hyper Neo Geo 64 hardware) on May 13, 1998.

It is the sequel to Roads Edge, released a year earlier. Like its predecessor, each track features loops on both endpoints, causing a two-way road that can lead to head-on collisions. Up to four cabinets can be linked up for multiplayer support.
